List available methods for any object and other classes for a method

Given any object returns all available methods for its class, or given a method list all other supported classes

list_methods_for_this_class(x)

list_classes_for_this_method(x)

Arguments

x

any object

Examples

#methods for data.frame
list_methods_for_this_class(iris)
#> * 'data.frame' class:
#>   - [.data.frame
#>   - [[.data.frame
#>   - [[<-,data.frame,ANY,ANY-method
#>   - [[<-.data.frame
#>   - [<-,data.frame,ANY,ANY,ANY-method
#>   - [<-.data.frame
#>   - $.data.frame
#>   - $<-,data.frame-method
#>   - $<-.data.frame
#>   - addAttrToGeom,SpatialGrid,data.frame-method
#>   - addAttrToGeom,SpatialLines,data.frame-method
#>   - addAttrToGeom,SpatialMultiPoints,data.frame-method
#>   - addAttrToGeom,SpatialPixels,data.frame-method
#>   - addAttrToGeom,SpatialPoints,data.frame-method

#methods for Coe objects
list_methods_for_this_class(bot %>% efourier)
#> 'nb.h' not provided and set to 10 (99% harmonic power)
#> * 'OutCoe' class:
#>   - boxplot.OutCoe

#methods for PCA objects
list_methods_for_this_class(bot %>% efourier %>% PCA)
#> 'nb.h' not provided and set to 10 (99% harmonic power)
#> * 'PCA' class:
#>   - $.PCA
#>   - arrange.PCA
#>   - as_df.PCA
#>   - boxplot.PCA
#>   - CLUST.PCA
#>   - export.PCA

#>   - MANOVA.PCA
#>   - mshapes.PCA

#>   - PCcontrib.PCA

#>   - print.PCA

#>   - rename.PCA
#>   - rePCA.PCA

#>   - select.PCA
#>   - slice.PCA
#>   - subset.PCA
#>   - table.PCA

#>   - biplot.prcomp
#>   - plot.prcomp
#>   - predict.prcomp
#>   - print.prcomp
#>   - summary.prcomp

# classes supported for
list_classes_for_this_method(PCAAA) # nothing
#> NULL
list_classes_for_this_method(PCA)
#>   - PCA.default
#>   - PCA.LdkCoe
#>   - PCA.OpnCoe
#>   - PCA.OutCoe
#>   - PCA.TraCoe
list_classes_for_this_method(sum) # nothing
#> NULL
